messages.message: so it seems that when pip installing libnfs with python3.6, it uses the libnfs.11.dylib library. however, the only package available with brew install libnfs installs libnfs.13.dylib. it seems to work when pip installing with python3.7, though. does anyone know how to resolve this? are we sticking to python3.6?
meh fixed it by symlinking libnfs.11.dylib -> libnfs.13.dylib lol hope it won’t cause issues
we’ll be staying on python3.6 — i didn’t run into those issues with python3.6 and file-service though — so don’t know exactly how to reproduce
That’s a common approach, it is likely fine.
